backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles with OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wiring public viewer and admin area with tabs and catalog state management.
Admin container rendering the upload form and catalog manager.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCatal: Admin table showing catalog items with delete actions and confirmation.
Admin authentication wrapper handling login, logout, and session state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Admin form for adding catalog items, including predefined label selection and bilingual label inputs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Backgroun: Renders the global background image with gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/MasparLay: Page layout with header, footer, social icons, and content wrapper using UI_TEXT and Background.
frontend/src/components/public/Collectio: Renders collection cards with icons and item counts, allowing selection highlighting.
Displays catalog items in a grid with media icons, previews, and content protection.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicVie: Main public catalog viewer with search, filtering, collections, item grid, and media modal.
frontend/src/components/public/SearchAnd: Search bar, collection filter, and language toggle for catalog browsing.
frontend/src/components/viewers/ImageZoo: Image viewer with zoom and rotation controls.
frontend/src/components/viewers/MediaVie: Modal showing image, video, or PDF viewers with content protection and escape handling.
frontend/src/components/viewers/PdfFirst: Displays first-page PDF preview via iframe.
frontend/src/components/viewers/VideoVie: Video player with controls and download restriction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Manages catalog state with local storage loading, seeding, add/remove, and refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, glassmorphism utilities, transitions, and content‑protection CSS classes.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Implements simple admin authentication using hardcoded credentials and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/catalogStorage.ts: Manages catalog items in localStorage with load, save, add, remove, and update helpers.
frontend/src/lib/catalogTypes.ts: Defines types for catalog items, labels, media types, and language values.
frontend/src/lib/collections.ts: Provides default collections and a function to derive active collections from catalog data.
frontend/src/lib/contentProtection.ts: Adds and removes event listeners to disable context menu and drag actions on elements.
frontend/src/lib/labelLanguage.ts: Stores and retrieves the user’s label language preference (en/hi) from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedLabels.ts: Contains a fixed list of predefined labels and a helper to validate them.
frontend/src/lib/seedCatalog.ts: Exports initial sample catalog items with bilingual labels and image sources.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Provides all static UI text strings for headers, navigation, admin, public viewer, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, requirements, and architectural notes.
